profile:
We have been one of the number 1 reviewed home inspection company for 12 years!!  

We take special Covid 19 safety precautions for everyone's safety.

All of our inspections include a 5 Year Roof Leak Warranty, 90 Day limited Warranty on: Mechanical, Structural, Mold and Sewer.  We also submit most appliances for a Recall Check.

Ask us about our Discounts!

Accurate Home Inspection is very proud to have won the Best of Calgary Home Inspection 8 Times! 2011, 12, 13, 14, 17, 18, 19 and 2020  Receiving this honour for the many years makes us want to work even harder for you and continue delivering the best home inspection service possible.

We are up to date in all aspects (certifications/memberships) to ensure that we do the inspection right the first time and every time.
Infrared Certified Building Thermographer, Red Seal Journeyman Carpenter, Professional Home Inspector (PHI), Certified Home Inspector (CHI)

Call us for a quote or fill out the inspection request on our website.   https://www.calgaryinspection.ca/inspection-request.html

Read some interesting articles on our blog:  https://www.calgaryinspection.ca/blog.html/

profile:
We are a 100% independent home inspection business, not a franchise, and we do not market to Realtors or affiliated to any, unlike 90% of home inspection business' in Alberta. 

98.76% of our business is recommendation & just 1.24% is from Realtors - what does that tell you? It is the only way you will get a 100% unbiased inspection on your largest investment. We do not have to keep the Realtor "sweetened" to get more business, because we are totally 100% Independent. 

Whether you hire us or not, check out our FREE tips page when hiring a home inspector - it could save you thousands of dollars and its FREE! 

Click here:
http://www.sherlockhomesinspectors.com/hiring.htm
